name: Modern Google
description: A simple and clean Google site. It adds a nice background, adds translucency, and even replaces the old, ugly Google logo. Unfortunately, you can't change the background yet, but I'm working on it. I'm totally new to publishing styles for Stylish.
additional_info:
I am not responsible for any damages caused by using my style, nor if you are incapable of use after installation. Then it just sucks to be you. 

If something looks wrong, it's probably a Google doodle. You should then disable the style until the party is over, and the logo returns to its usual mundaneness.

Version 1.0
